questions.q: If the two angles of a triangle are 45° and 60°, respectively, then what is the third angle?
If a triangle has one of its angle 90, what is it called?
If a triangle has sides equal to 5cm, 4cm and 6cm, then what is its perimeter?
If the height of a triangle is 7cm and the base length is equal to 10 cm, then what is its area?
